projectArray.title: Lemuria
projectArray.description: Everybody needs a friend. Learn when to stop. There's not a thing in the world wrong with washing your brush.

projectArray.title: Recipe Book
projectArray.description: Let that brush dance around there and play. It looks so good, I might as well not stop. Isn't it fantastic that you can change your mind and create all these happy things?

projectArray.title: A Creative Title
projectArray.description: You can do anything your heart can imagine. It's a super day, so why not make a beautiful sky? You don't have to be crazy to do this but it does help.

projectArray.title: Other Thing
projectArray.description: I really believe that if you practice enough you could paint the 'Mona Lisa' with a two-inch brush. I'm a water fanatic. I love water.

projectArray.title: Grocery List Container
projectArray.description: There are no mistakes. You can fix anything that happens. With something so strong, a little bit can go a long way.

projectArray.title: Photo Album
projectArray.description: This is your world, whatever makes you happy you can put in it. Go crazy. This is gonna be a happy little seascape.
